mapper.select:
SELECT A.FREE_NO, A.NICKNAME, A.FREE_TITLE, A.FREE_CREATE_DATE, A.FREE_HIT FROM FREE_BRD A WHERE 1 = 1
AND (FREE_CREATE_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND NOW())
AND (FREE_CREATE_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND NOW())
AND (FREE_CREATE_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) AND NOW())
AND (FREE_CREATE_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR) AND NOW())
AND FREE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%')
AND FREE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%')
AND FREE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR FREE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')
AND NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%')
ORDER BY A.FREE_NO DESC LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BRD (NICKNAME, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT, FREE_CREATE_DATE, FREE_MODIFY_DATE, FREE_IP, FREE_HIT) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{freeTitle}, #{freeContent}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d'), #{freeIp}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BRD SET FREE_TITLE = #{freeTitle}, FREE_CONTENT = #{freeContent}, FREE_MODIFY_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d') WHERE FREE_NO = #{freeNo}
